text: i used to work in advertising as the
landscape became more and more
competitive
we looked to technology to give us an
edge
[Music]
the first time i was exposed to aws as a
customer i was like
whoa i was simply blown away i decided
there and then that this is the kind of
disruptive service i want to work with
and that this is the company that i want
to work for today
i'm an account manager in the isv
segment working with large-scale
cloud-native customers
who build their services on top of aws
when i see the reactions to some of the
services and solutions we provide
i can still remember how it felt for me
at aws
you can basically achieve anything you
have the freedom and resources
to think big and create your own wow
moments
